entry.title: Felt Stocking Christmas Jungle Santa 89235E
entry.summary:
Vendor: Plaid
Type: Felt Ornament Kit
Price: 15.49

Felt Stocking Christmas Jungle Santa 89235E

Your holiday just got a little wilder with the Bucilla Jungle Santa Felt Stocking Kit. Stitch this playful scene of Santa reading while a plethora of jungle animals gather around him. This kit includes stamped felts, cotton floss, color-separated sequins and beads, two needles, and instructions. Your mantelpiece will stand out with the beauty of this fun design and shimmering embellishments. Pair this stocking with the Bucilla Jungle Santa Felt Ornaments. Create a hand-stitched heirloom your family will cherish year after year with the Bucilla Jungle Santa Felt Stocking Kit.

  • Item #89235E
  • UPC #046109892351
  • Condition: New
  • Size: 18" diagonal

Vendor: Plaid
Type: Felt Ornament Kit
Price: 15.49

Felt Stocking Building A Snowman 89071E 

Stitch a winter wonderland of forest animals with the adorable "Building a Snowman" kit from Bucilla. Spend an evening crafting a handmade heirloom your family will cherish each holiday. This kit includes stamped felts, cotton floss, color-separated sequins and beads, two needles, and instructions. For over 150 years, Bucilla has helped people all over the world create heirloom-quality needlework pieces for stitchers of every interest and skill level. Take some time to destress from the day with this whimsical "Building a Snowman" felt kit.

Felt Stocking Storytime Bears 89328E

Cozy up with your family around the Christmas tree with the Bucilla Storytime Bears Felt Stocking Kit. This festive stocking features the scene of a mother bear and her bear cubs reading a book together on Christmas Eve, surrounded by gifts and treats for Santa. This embroidery kit includes stamped felt, cotton embroidery floss, color-separated sequins and beads, two embroidery needles, and instructions. entry.title: Klear Kote PLUS UV Epoxy Resin 2 gal kit NEW
entry.summary:
Vendor: CreativeWholesale
Type: Epoxy Resin
Price: 111.00

Klear Kote PLUS, with UV Inhibitor   KKPLUS

NEW PRODUCT  2 Gallons Kit

High Gloss Epoxy Coating

Two Gallon Kit, (Contains 1 Gallon Resin, 1 Gallon Hardener.) 
Klear Kote PLUS Epoxy Coating is an clear, high gloss finishing epoxy.  Klear Kote PLUS has been formulated for improved UV resistance to reduce yellowing and surface degradation from UV exposure.  Ideal as a table top epoxy, bar top epoxy, art epoxy, and for home improvements, craft projects, and many other finishes. 

Klear Kote Application Instructions

SDS for Klear Kote PLUS Hardener

SDS for Klear Kote Resin

 

ORM-D, Consumer Commodity product.  GROUND SHIPMENTS ONLY.   See Terms and Conditions.

Mod Podge ® Satin, 16 oz. - CS17295

Mod Podge Satin is a quick-drying all-in-one glue, sealer, and finish for decoupaging on any surface. Dries to a clear satin finish with a subtle sheen. Perfect for home decor projects. Cleans up easily while wet with soap and water. Certified AP non-toxic; water-based.

entry.title: Plaid ® Let's Paint™ Modern Paint-by-Number - Fall Bird - 17914
entry.summary:
Vendor: Plaid
Type: Paint By Number Kit
Price: 9.99

Plaid ® Let's Paint™ Modern Paint-by-Number - Fall Bird - 17914


Paint the beauty of the harvest season with the Fall Bird Modern Paint-By-Number Kit. This canvas features a small bird perched on a fall tree. Each kit contains a 14" x 14" canvas, a paint brush, and 10 acrylic paint to complete your painting. This paint-by-number is easy-to-follow and can be mounted, stretched, or framed to add charm to your home decor. This paint-by-number kit is great for adults and kids and is the perfect way to relax - make this kit a part of your next art therapy session! Paint a stunning autumn scene with the Fall Bird Modern Paint-By-Number Kit.

entry.title: Premo Sculpey® Gray Granite 8 ounce blocks PE08 5065 New Color
entry.summary:
Vendor: Polyform
Type: Polymer Clay
Price: 6.48

Copy of Premo Sculpey®Gray Granite 8 ounce blocks PE08 5065

NEW COLOR

premo Sculpey® is an artist’s dream come true! After conditioning, this clay is soft enough to blend easily but firm enough to hold fine detail and for specialized techniques.

It’s perfect for caning,   and mica shift. Because retains flexibility, the finished product remains very strong and durable. Plus, Sculpey® comes in 25 inspiring, unique colors to complement your creations with the most vibrant variety of shades. See our polymer clay color chart below and choose from 2-oz., 8-oz. or 1-lb. quantities to suit your needs.

Wondering how to use Sculpey® for the best results? Condition with a clay conditioning machine then use your hands and tools to create the details you want for your finished products.

entry.summary:

Type: Hobby Knife
Price: 8.19

Excel Blades - K18 Grip-on Knife # 17018

Set of 3 Knives (mixed colors) with #11 double honed blade.  

 

  • K18 Cushion grip knife comes with #11 double honed blade
  • Precision knife with special screw for extra blade security and stabilization
  • Excel Blades K18 knife is available in black, blue, green, grey, red and purple. 
  • Used for: precision paper cutting, trimming card-stock and rubber, stripping of paper
  • Use with: foam, plastic, wood, cloth, film, polymer clay, cork, clay carving, pumpkin carving. 
  • Used by: graphic artists, designers, hobbyists, scrapbook artists and crafters
  • Grip-On Knife fits with Excel Blades #5, #6, #10, #11, #12, #13, #16, #17, #17A and #21.

  • Made in the USA
